name: Smooth & Sharp: Free Logo Pack
description:
Hey you,

Thank you for checking out our work.


I have neatly packed and arranged this file for direct download here, also free. If you're in a hurry or need to use logos in this file right away, then you can download it from there.


Smooth & Sharp is a 100% free logo pack based on alphabets. Made by me as part of a larger project at Hatrio Domains â€” helping entrepreneurs with branding, domain names and design.


Highlights:

  • Multiple versions included (color, dark, white, etc)
  • Your brand's look and feel are softer and friendly? Choose Smooth logos
  • Your brand's look and feel are bold and energetic? Choose Sharp logos
  • Fully made in Figma ðŸ’–


It's 100% free for unlimited use on your personal and commercial projects. Attribution is not required, you're more than welcome to provide attribution though.


Feel free to follow our work. This is just the beginning, we have got huge plans for the coming months. You can follow me on Twitter @iamdinakar or check out my company website at Hatrio.com.


Fair disclosure: Art and visuals are always subjective. You'll find some great logos here but you may also find some not-so-great logos. For the most part, we were mainly sticking to a theme. To ensure you're satisfied we have included multiple versions. If you have feedback to make the design assets better, then feel free to reach out to me on Twitter, or through the email contacts found on our website.
